content.detailedDescription: I cannot speak about my thoughts and my perception of events in a public forum.  the photo is a small perhaps not even a confirmation of what i believe for me and what i can evaluate happens to me at random points in my life.
content.summary: Indications of strange marks on my driveway after many strange lifetime events

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in my vehicle it was dark and foggy. i noticed lights above my vehicle. it was directly above my vehicle. i noticed i did not have control over my vehicle anymore.  i was taken out of my vehicle and placed in a field.  i saw a creature that appeared to be 8-9ft tall, 3-4ft wide with dark hair. it appeared to be looking for something.  when it turned and i could see the face of this creature i notice it had red glowing eyes.  the eyes did not appear to be red because of light, at this time there was no light only it's eyes were lit up like radio active.  it saw me, grabbed me, threw me across a field, i got thrown against a tree.  i was then put back in my vehicle, which still was not responding to anything i was trying to do.  my vehicle would not steer or slowdown i could not even get my brakes to work.  i saw a sign indicating that there was a 90 degree corner.  this was in the winter time so the roads were snowy and icy the sign said 15 miles per hour.  the vehicle went from 25mph to 45mph. i tried to brake, nothing, the corner was coming up quickly, i knew there was nothing i could do. i covered my face with one of my arms while the other was on the wheel. the vehicle simply drove off the road into the ditch where i struck a sign, telephone pole and a tree. when i was finally stopped i looked up and saw no lights or object of any kind anymore.
content.summary: Lights above my vehical as i was driving was taken out of car had encounter then placed back in car.

content.detailedDescription: A co worker and i were coming down the driveway at our place of employment, as we started to turn left i saw 3 lights in the sky that at first were semi obscured by trees. i asked my friend what they were and he thought it was a buoy as we are on the delaware river. i said that they were way too high for that and he agreed. we then headed towards the lights about 50 yards further down the driveway to get a better look and possibly film the objects. as we filmed from the car and looked, it was clearly 3 red lights forming a triangle that was sort of trying to keep that formation, as they one would go too far left or right. i got out of the car and took my phone to make sure he was using it correctly and found that it was zoomed in all the way and got about another 10 seconds of footage. the objects then speeded up a little and headed southeast, and just shut off the light one by one, until totally fading from view. i raced through possible explanations in my mind and verbally such as chinese lanterns (but they changed direction) military aircraft in formation(but it would have been a very hard formation to keep not to mention the angle just seemed wrong). we then were very excited because we felt that we had seen a real ufo and actually captured some video. i couldn't make out any structural design of the objects, they just seemed like red lights, swaying a little bit here and there but still keeping a general triangular shape between the three of them. they were facing us dead on when we first observed them which i think would have put them over the river in new jersey, as they started heading over the river they changed direction to southeast and then just disappeared one by one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were coming down the driveway and just before turning observed 3 red lights forming a triangle that started to move to the southeast then blinked outp

content.detailedDescription:
I was going through photos i had taken in lightroom when i came across two that had elements i hadn't seen when i'd been taking them. to be clear: i did not see the objects until the day after the event. at the time the images were captured i did not see anything i thought was unusual or abnormal. a description of the time of the event follows.

i was at a construction site right by the whelie-reston east metro station taking photos for a project. as it was getting pretty cold out, i decided to make my next photos the last before heading out. i set up my camera on a tripod for a long exposure of the highway figuring it might make an interesting shot. my camera settings for both photos were iso 200 f/11 at a 30 second exposure, the second picture was taken approximately one minute after the first. during the this time i did not see any unusual lights or hear any unusual sounds. i suspect that the brightness of area i was in didn't allow my eyes to adjust to be able to see the relatively subtle green lights in the dark sky.

notes: 
at in a 30 second exposure, lights that don't hold still will leave "light trails" in the final picture, just as the cars did, these objects however don't appear to have left any, leading me to think they either were only momentarily present, or they were completely still for the duration of the exposure. 

the camera was facing roughly south, the white lights and antenna visible on the right are most likely from the hughes middle school/south lakes high school, which lie in that direction.

i checked for meteor showers in the area, and there was one that was visible in the area on the two days prior, but again: moving lights such as meteors would have left streaks/light trails in the photo, which is not the case.

on the second photo in particular, a vague circular outline can be made out around some of the lights, suggesting the light is being emitted by these circular objects.

i am not sure what the yellow light trails are/were left by, but they look unrelated to the  green lights as those appear to be in formation.
content.summary: Green lights in formation, possibly emitted by circular objects

content.detailedDescription:
These are actually my friends pics taken on her cellphone which actually takes impressive pics
she likes to take random pics of the arizona sky/clouds usually whenever she is out driving and thinks the sky looks pretty.
she was driving at the time pics were taken and she did not notice the object.  it wasn't until the next day when she went to show me her latest sky pics that we noticed this object and that it was in a few of her pics taken in sequence and obviously it moves during the pics
thought we would send them in to you guys for review

thanks :)
content.summary: Object was not visible when pics were being taken

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of nice cloud formation. when reviewing the photos i saw the object. in one frame it appears close.
content.summary: Last object rolled. framed before in severa pieces

content.detailedDescription: Moved very slow left to right then stopped mid air for about 30 seconds then zig zagged up and out of sight  in split second. we were camping on a mountain top and girlfriend screamed and pointed up at it ran toward me.  we watched it hover with no sound, they were huge! with a fluorescent orange color, two triangles.    they froze mid air for about 30 seconds then in a split second zig zagged upward and out of sight without a sound.  we were stunned and could not believe what we saw much less the speed in which it moved.  it did not blink, it was solid in color bright fluorescent redish orange.
content.summary: Witnessed 2 huge fluorescent triangles flying overhead without a sound and disappear in zig zag motion at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: I was heading towards cave creek az.From phoenix az. on the 202 east. noticed something in sky, there were acyually two things in sky, one was long but i focused on the smaller one because it was closer. so i kept noticing it as i drove and it didnt move and i couldnt make out any shape. i finally pulled over and tried to take pic with my crappy phone, nothin but a small blur. i called my girlfriend and told her. i got back on freeway and kept watching it, it started changing into a long cylinder shape and then to a point, as this was going on, it started leaving a wide contrail. the trail got longer and it looked like it was going straight up. i could almost make out a shape but i was going down the freeway and had to watch the road. i noticed a flashing light and it was going out of view due to my position, so i got off at val vista exit and pulled over in a parking lot. it was gone......When i got to my destination (walmart in queen creek) and completed my job, i saw two blackhawk helicopters. when i was driving back i saw another blackhawk. did anybody else see this????
content.summary: It hovered for about 10 minutes and changed shape then took off leaving a trail.

content.detailedDescription: My first was binoculars (toronto etobikoe canada)taped to a tripod, 1975? out in the park with friend and focusted on a building antenna south and we saw it pulsate and move up a bit then streeked west like a lazer or in the dark, a cigarette in dark leaving a trail. i saw a 2nd event with same friend which driving back from hamilton in budget rent a car, saw with 5 of us see in front blink up and zip south. 3rd event was over my house and a bright light strobing, no noise went over to the west of toronto interntional airport. saw outside at work a "star" that at night just went outward into space like a meteriod coming in. looked out to the west in my bathroom window at night and for 3-5 min saw a pulsing light (no green or red) just hovered around and moved around that heli or planes can't do! i tried to pic with my cell but light at apt. in front blocked pic. i know they exsist and how and where do they come from?
content.summary: 2 out 5 blinking ufo, 2 white lights 1 red on top zipped away

content.detailedDescription: I just want you to contact me 7054650132 kyle larocque

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to walk the dog when looking to south over the roof of the houses i saw these ablject flying like a fomation of birds but without wings moviment and very straight line. few were faster than other recovering the gap from the back. moved west to east when i was going to pick up my cell phone i saw a flashlight all around those object and tehy were disappeared. they looked like black balls no sound no lights nothing just flying black balls. i though were about 1 mile from me. no more than 300 - 400 feet elevation.
i though coulkd be birds but i couldn't see moviment of wings and they flew too straigh. i though the speed could be over 100 miles/h to across my view field from right ( west) to left (east) they spent few seconds.
were no absolutely birds.
content.summary: Fle like formation of ducks but too fast to be birds then disappeared in a flashlight

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a very small cigar shaped object that went from west to east in a spinning motion then object moved quickly over buildings into the eastern sky.
object was observed about 5 minutes.
content.summary: Observed a very small cigar shaped white bright object

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a road trip out west, traveling through nm at the time. we were only a few miles outside of roswell, when something caught my eye. at first glance it looked like a black bar flying through the sky. it was traveling from the south heading north at a slow rate of speed. as we got closer to the object it flew over the highway we were traveling on, and it was only about 50-60 feet off the ground. then it just stopped mid flight, about 40 feet to the north of the road, hovered up about 20 feet and then it lowered itself to about 25 feet off the ground and just hung there. that's when i could tell that it was actually triangular in shape and the top and bottom of the object appeared to be giving off a lot of heat. i began shouting to my family in the rv, asking "is anyone else is seeing this?!". my sister was sitting directly behind my and she was able to look out the window and that's when she also saw the object. she became a bit hysterical and began to scream " what the hell is that thing?". i was so shocked at what i was seeing that i totally forgot i had a camera strapped around my neck, and by the time i had gotten it turned on we lost sight of the object and there were no windows in the back of the rv that had a clear line of sight on the object, so unfortunately, i was unable to get a photo of it. the whole thing lasted only a minute or so, but it was by far the strangest thing i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Black triangular shaped object flew over the road in front of us and hovered 25 feet off the ground on the other side of the road.

content.detailedDescription:
This is only the most recent occurrence, though i have had other experiences that might interest you more. this recent visit began last night, in my apartment. 

i walked into my bedroom, taking off my uniform, after work. from the corner of my eye, i saw a mist-like movement made of white light, which moved horizontally from left to right, turned near the wall, and moved upward at about fifteen degrees. the motion was fluid, and the turn had a curvature to it as it happened. dismissing it, i turned off the light, and walked in to my living room. it was here that i saw the form directly, as i stared, lost in thought, toward my kitchen. it moved in front of me, about four feet from the floor, from right to left. it was much like a cloud, but it did not disperse, as smoke would. it moved into my son's bedroom. which was empty and dark at the time, and lies on the other side of my apartment. i felt as though i were not alone, and called out. "i saw that," i said. "you ought to know that you can't hide from me." i heard a sound coming from the room, which sounded like one of the toys being moved, or disturbed. "there's no reason to hide," i said. "i'm not going to hurt you. just come out slowly, and we can talk." the sounds happened again, and i walked to the open doorway of my son's room, and looked into the darkness. "if i try hard enough, i'll be able to see you. there's no reason to go hiding in the dark. that's why people are afraid of you. it's scary." in front of me, a shadow formed against the dimly lit wall in the bedroom. it was about seven feet tall, and shaped like the outline of a man. "there you go," i said. "still, this shadow stuff is pretty creepy. just come out here, and we can talk. i'll move away from the door." i stepped back about twenty feet, into the middle of my living room. "i'm nice, there's no reason to be afraid of me," i said. as i was speaking those words, a red-orange ball of light floated from my son's room, about five feet from the ground, and headed over my couch, and through the closed window. i saw it as clearly as i have seen anything else. a half-second after seeing it pass through the blinds (and presumably, the glass), i heard a commotion on my porch, and felt the vibration of something running down the stairs. i opened the door to see an enormous, mostly gray male calico cat walking briskly away. i have been watching the local cats at night, just in passing, and have given them all nicknames. i have never seen this cat before. he was the size of an english bulldog. i called out to him, and though his motion indicated that he had heard me, he did not slow down, or turn around.

they came for me again, later last night. i wasn't surprised.

i have seen a few ufos, and have had several experiences. i have two working implants at the moment, and have even been able to keep four memories on board the craft. i have never even imagined a scenario like this.

i would like to state, plainly, that i am relied upon by many people for my intellect, and analytical nature. i am not given to hallucinations, and am a well-adjusted, happy, and steadily employed man. i have been reluctant to share my experiences, and it is a well-kept secret that only a small number of people know about. after last night, i have decided to reach out, and attempt to find others who have experienced some of these occurrences.

thank you for reading.
content.summary: An entity entered my apartment, and i witnessed this directly.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5:45 ish and i was driving north on coon rapids blvd into anoka, as i was getting up to where mercy hospital put in the new walk way i noticed what i can only explain as sparkling in the sky, the sparkling was really dim but it was pretty obvious once i noticed it.

so i pulled over into the parking lot and got out of my car to look at it, as soon as i did that the sparkling stopped and i swear i seen what looked like a big black object in the sky, then as soon as it happened it stopped, but what caught me is strange is all of a sudden the moon and mars were visible, it took me a couple minutes to collect my thoughts then i realized this black object had completely blocked out the sky, i didn't notice the moon and mars was missing i just noticed the sparkling in the sky.

shortly after that i was heading west on south diamond lake road in champlin, i was coming up to the lake it's self and off in the distance i noticed these really bright lights, as i came over the hill by the little chapel on the right i noticed 3 massive glowing lights in the sky, these lights started as a straight line then moved into a upside triangle formation, the lights were all different colors, from white to blue to orange. i quickly pulled over on a side road and got out of my car yet again to look, i called a buddy of mine who was staying at a hotel in the area to go outside and look but as soon as i hung up the phone the bottom light disappeared and then the two top lights shot off in opposite directions.

this isn't my first ufo sightings but as usually i feel very curious about them i was not afraid, but these 2 were so close together and so obvious i had to report them.
content.summary: Two separate sightings in close proximity

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were driving back from albuquerque through the el malpais national monument to arizona. just as the sun was beginning to drop we noticed reflective prisms on both sides of the sun. i started snapping photos at this interesting view of the sky.

upon later observation we noticed a blue green like orb moving in every picture from what appeared to be the ground, up over a hill and setting off in the distance. after further research the moon was in a crescent phase so it couldn't be that and at the rate of each picture taken in relation to where the orb is in each pic tells me that the orb was moving at a pretty fast pace. 

during the drive and looking at the sky we were not able to see the orb with our naked eyes. they were found after my brother had a friend in nm taking a pic of a different prism a week later which really appears to be a space ship, there appears to be the same orb in his pictures too which i have copies of and will send to you too. this friend of my brothers did not see the orb either until he looked at his pictures. we compared pics and the orb is of the same color and size and motion across the horizon.

his photos are named orb1, orb2 etc
content.summary: Taking pictures of a prisim in the sky and noticed the orb in all the pics

content.detailedDescription: It was martin luther king day, that night after 10:00 pm est time i was outside in my yard with my dog when i begain to notice a number of jet aircraft making  large circular paths in a counter clockwise direction coming out the southwest banking and leaving in the northeast. i watched one of the jets as it made its flight path turn untill it was out of my line of sight as i turned back to the southwest to see the next jet there was a orange glowing spear stationary in the south south west sky slightly above a 45' angle. it slowly begain moving in the same counter clockwise direction as the jets, it picked up a little speed and also diapered from my light of sight just as the jets in a northeast direction, i seen no other jets in the sky after the spear had flew away. i served in the military for 10 years i am well educated in aircraft i have no idea what this was i could hear the jets as they made there larger turning radius than the orange glowing spear which was in a closer turning radius and it made no sound. i. wounder if anyone else's seen this object in the south east georgia sky on that night
content.summary: In yard with dog noticed jets at a distance appearing to make large circles counter clokwise, then noticed orange spear moving slowly then stopped and begain same path as jets

content.detailedDescription: I first thought it was birds,then i noticed none of them were flapping their wings. i kept looking at them, it's then i noticed the they was not birds. after just standing in the garden a watching them they just vanished, disappeared.  i don't understand what was going on but it just came to my attention last night after watching the ufo program that they where the same objects the guy in the us saw.
content.summary: It was last year summer time, i was at home in the garden doing a bbq, i just look up to the sky admiring the lovely weather when i noticed a flock of objects just hovering around in the sky. i first thought it was birds, then i kept looking at them and

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in a vehicle driving south in the ken karyl area of littleton, co near c470east. i looked west and high above the mountains
i saw a huge light like a sun--blindingly white like the sun can be in colorado just before sunset. 
the sun was actually setting south of this object. it was large and round looked like a planet
just hovering high above. there was a white cloud below the sphere in the shape of an upside down flame.  there was a very small cloud to the south, but near the sphere and otherwise the sky was clear.
i looked at many web pictures and i thought it might be a meteoritic fireball but it did not move from one spot and didn't really have a tail. i really wondered if i was seeing something like melancholia or ceres,
and ceres was just "hangin'  out'. i have seen ball lightning and very large, fast, close meteors and this thing was neither.
we had to keep driving and didn't have a camera but i didn't lose sight of it until i got into my own vehicle and took c470 w to 285 s and up into the hills.  
it was amazing and somewhat upsetting. it was a sign and a wonder, but was it lying?
content.summary: Very large blue-white sphere high above me.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i arrived at the school parking lot for a 
b-ball game.  we were walking in when she said what is that.  looking south we both saw 3 orange lights forming a triangle hovering then appearing to slowly move towards the east.  they maintained there distance from each other as they moved. a couple other orange lights were then seen thru the trees moving the same direction but they were obscured at times due to trees.  none of these lights looked like anything we had ever seen before and we both kept saying "what is that".  after viewing the lights for about a minute i wanted to get a clear view with out the trees so we jumped in the car and drove .75 miles to the east where there were open fields.  when we arrived there a couple minutes later there was no sign of the lights.  the sky was mostly clear with stars visible but there were some areas of clouds.  we drove back to the school and the lights were gone.  a very strange event and we have been asking ourselves several times a day, what was that?
content.summary: Orange lights hovering, 3 formed a triangle viewed clearly thru a opening in the tree cover.  a couple other orange lights seen thru trees but were obscured.

content.detailedDescription: Large wing like chevron with lights seen over southern part of imperial beach as i was coming home from playas de tijuana mexico side i could not hear noise as i was driving with windows up looked like the phenix lights
content.summary: Very large wing like chevron with lights

content.detailedDescription:
In august of 1998 i went to england for a vacation. i took a day cruise to belgium. while returning i saw a shining object to the east. since it was early evening the sun was low in the west. there were clouds to the east and the object was stationary below the clouds. i watched the object for perhaps 20 minutes before it made a rapid vertical climb that took only seconds to disappear behind clouds.
the second experience occurred back in canada a couple of months later. while sleeping i felt myself being pulled through the air at tremendous speed. my face was contorted as a result of the g force. my next recollection was being in a dark space. in front of me there appeared to be some kind of instrument panel. in front of me at a short distance there was an entity. it was a silhouetted and the frontal features were not visible due to the darkness. there was no sound but i had a sense that there was some sort of communication. i did not feel any discomfort during this encounter, i didn't feel threatened in any way. my next awareness was in my bed. my face was hot and felt very dry. my body was completely paralysed. the paralysis while being totally aware of what had just happened was disconcerting. for the next ten years i regularly felt the pinging in my ear and had a feeling that some part of my mind was being uploaded. i have not had that experience for many years. there have been many occasions when i discover cuts or other marks on my body which i cannot explain.
content.summary: There were 2 events. 1) observed object (shining) stationary for many minutes  b4 rapid vert lift.2) abduction months later

content.detailedDescription: I have had numerous ufo sightings, this is just one of them however i did not see this one.  i prayed to see a ufo and one came at 4:00 am and must have landed.  there are still marks left there.  a knock on my window woke me up.  i was to scared to open the blinds.  i ran out of the room but came right back cause my daughter was there.  my heart was racing and i just sat there dumbfounded.   i have seen so many sightings.  most of them in cobleskill ny by howes caverns.  they are there all the time.  i have alot of experiences with orbs to.  some are orange and some white.  i think some of the orange are not good.  the white are good.   two purple orbs in my bathroom in ny.  seen three orbs since i have been in florida.  will be hard for you to believe me cause i did not see it.  i know for sure it was one.  seen to many to be unsure.  afraid to contact you while in ny cause i heard you are affiliated with the government.  they have all this data and keep your files on all who file with you.  if this is true,  oh well because they already know me and where i am.  that is why i see them all the time.
content.summary: Did not see it.  they knocked on my window.  to afraid to look.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the titicaca lake in the shores of carabuco town, taking night pictures of the lake and the stars. 
i havent noticed it until i sow the pictures.
i thought inmediatly it was a big ufo ive seen one similar aswell in titicaca lake but in other side of it. you can notice the difference between stars and directed lights
it appears moves a bit and then dissapear.
it is always a bit different being in the lake, in those remote places people from the town and indigens talk about it as a common event.
content.summary: Strange lights appearing in the sky and then dissapearing
content.locationName: Nuestra Seora de La Paz, La Paz Department

content.detailedDescription: Taking picture of odd shaped cloud with my phone. didn't see the object until blew up the photo to get a better view of the cloud. objected showed in 2 frames. would have taken more shots if seen with the naked eye.
content.summary: Circle with white dots that may be lights but not on. moved w/o sound from s to n in e sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I've noticed this light on several occasions. clear night early evening or early morning. it's usually in the same area of the sky. the light pulses a variety of colours. red. blue.White. yellow and green. i've taken several pictures but last night was the first time i've got anything special.
i live near the fredericton airport and know it's not the normal aircraft. having served 27 years in the canadian air force i'm familiar with flight characteristics. this thing is there for awhile,then it's gone.
i am very far way from it but i have a canon 60d with a 150/500 lens and a 2x tele-converter. i photograph high flying aircraft all the time and know what they look like.
this object maintains a specific position for some time. two hours or so at times. it's not there every clear night so that's how i know it's not normal.When i photograph it the stars are in the background.
i took the pictures from my side deck about 15 feet off the ground. i have about 50 pictures of this object.
content.summary: Observed a flashing light in the sky when facing east towards st john nb.

content.detailedDescription: I have kept this to myself all my life until now. in the town of cheshire there was a park on rt 10 called cheshire park. the park has or at the time had two seperate areas.  in front near the road were ball fields and tennis courts. in back of this were woods with walking trails and a pond.  it was evening, the lights were on and youth football was going on in the fields.  i don't remember why but i was on the walking trail standing on a wooden bridge that crossed over the brook that either went into or came from the pond.  it was dark and a clear night.  suddenly from my left abruptly came this round white object.  it was not normal in several ways.  it began to hover in one spot but would move to the left or right and hover there. the way it moved has never left my mind.  it was suddenly in one spot then suddenly in another..There was no transition path...It was in one spot then in another.  it did this for several minutes moving from one place to another..The suddely just shot straight up and disappeared.  as far as sound goes there was none...If anything it made what i call a sound vacum...None. i do not believe it was more than 200 feet in the air.
content.summary: Hovering. brilliant white object...Then departed straight up.

content.detailedDescription: A close friend of mine and prominent air force scientist photographed this rod hovering in the sky. when he first saw it he thought it was a banner being towed by an airplane. but it didn't move for at least a few hours. when he pointed it out to his friends in the balloon, they tried to explain it away but when they couldn't they just ignored it. fortunately he took one picture of it.
content.summary: A rod photographed during the international balloon festival.

content.detailedDescription: I am a professor of physics at the university of the atlantic. on 5 november 1980 conversation with a neighbor in the asotea the building where you live in the city of barranquilla located in carrera 45 and calle 55 (colombia) on an investigation had been doing for 15 years, trying to netender the so-called "ufo phenomenon" when the comaero asked me the question: you believe ufos exist ?. if its away, i said jokingly, in this instatae should receive one. he had not finished telling der frace when in front of us at a distance of about 200 meters and a height of about 50 meters i like two lights flashing and apparently our dierccin. we looked at the faces, we did not say a word and went .The issue never touched. i have continued my studies and i have many answers to doubts and wrong beliefs, if you are interested in is the can communicate. i hope your answer tell my mail.
content.summary: I am a professor of physics at the university of the atlantic. on 5 november 1980 conversation with a neighbor in the asotea the building where you live in the city of barranquilla located in carrera 45 and calle 55 (colombia) on an investigation had been
content.locationName: Barranquilla (Distrito Especial, Industrial Y Portuario), Atlntico
